summary: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.
cast: Mark Wahlberg|Taylor Kitsch|Emile Hirsch|Ben Foster|Yousuf Azami|Ali Suliman|Eric Bana|Alexander Ludwig|Rich Ting|Dan Bilzerian|Jerry Ferrara|Rick Vargas|Scott Elrod|Gregory Rockwood|Ryan Kay|Patrick Griffin|Josh Berry|Eric Steinig|David Shepard|Justin Tade|Sterling Jones|Jason Riggins|Matthew Page|Sammy Sheik|Nicholas Patel|Daniel Arroyo|Zarin Rahimi|Rohan Chand|Anthony McKenzie|Brian Call|Ishmael Antonio|Samuel Cloud|Perparim 'Peter' Bici|Henry Penzi|Robert Loerke|Kurt Carlson|Daniel Fulcoly|Michael P. Doudell|Edmund Blanchet|Jim Cusic|Mikael Ayele|Peter Berg|Todd Bethke|Rowdy Brown|Nicoletta Chapman|Scott Esquibel|Trey Holland|Timothy Holmes|Cory Kapahulehua|Sergio Kato|Darlene Kellum|Jahan Khalili|Lawrence Kruckeberg|Corey Large|Marcus Luttrell|Joseph Daniel Martinez|Crystal Miller|Tailor Murray|Maxine Paul|Frank Powers|Anthony Reynolds|Diego Romero|Michael Isaac Salman|Hillel Michael Shamam
title: El único superviviente
